title: My Art Journey
script:
Anushka: Namaste doston! Aaj main aapse apni kala yatra ke baare mein baat karna chahti hoon.
Anushka: Bachpan mein, rangon se dosti hui. Deewaron pe aedi-tedi lines banaati thi – maa daanti thi, par mujhe maza aata tha!
Anushka: Fir school mein drawings banayi, competitions mein participate kiya – kuch jeeti, kuch haari.
Anushka: Lekin har ek drawing, har ek haar, har ek jeet ne mujhe kuch sikhaya.
Anushka: College mein maine socha engineering karungi…par dil toh rangon mein atka tha.
Anushka: Fir ek din, maine decide kiya – dil ki sunungi. Art school join kar liya.
Anushka: Logon ne kaha, "kya karogi art karke?" Par mujhe pata tha, yahi mera raasta hai.
Anushka: Ab main freelance artist hoon. Paintings banati hoon, exhibitions karti hoon.
Anushka: Abhi bhi seekh rahi hoon…abhi bhi experiments karti hoon…par har din, har brushstroke, mujhe khushi deta hai.
Anushka: Meri art journey abhi shuru hui hai…aur main excited hoon, yeh dekhne ke liye ki aage kya hota hai! Dhanyavaad!
